sys_ws_operation.name: update

sys_update_version.name: sys_ws_operation_3b483212dbd12300197478fdaa961961
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri>/api/x_chef_automate/properties</default_operation_uri><enforce_acl>66192ffddb856b40197478fdaa961988</enforce_acl><http_method>PUT</http_method><name>update</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var logger = new Logger();
	var jsonUtil = new JsonUtil();
	try {
		// Set Properties
		var propertyData = jsonUtil.parse(request.body.dataString);
		gs.setProperty("x_chef_automate.insert_manufacturer", propertyData['insert_manufacturer']);
		gs.setProperty("x_chef_automate.insert_model", propertyData['insert_model']);
		gs.setProperty("x_chef_automate.logging.enabled",propertyData['logging_enabled']);
		gs.setProperty("x_chef_automate.logging.verbosity",propertyData['logging_level']);
		gs.setProperty("x_chef_automate.client_runs_per_node",propertyData['client_runs_per_node']);
		gs.setProperty("x_chef_automate.compliance_reports_per_node",propertyData['compliance_reports_per_node']);
	
		response.setBody({"insert_manufacturer":gs.getProperty("x_chef_automate.insert_manufacturer"), 
			"insert_model":gs.getProperty("x_chef_automate.insert_model"),
			"logging_verbosity":gs.getProperty("x_chef_automate.logging.verbosity"),
			"client_runs_per_node":gs.getProperty("x_chef_automate.client_runs_per_node"),
			"compliance_reports_per_node":gs.getProperty("x_chef_automate.compliance_reports_per_node"),
			"logging_enabled":gs.getProperty("x_chef_automate.logging.enabled")});
	} catch (err) {
		logger.errorWithStack("REST API call /api/x_chef_automate/asset error", err);
		error = new sn_ws_err.ServiceError();
		error.setStatus(500);
		error.setMessage(err.message);
		response.setError(error);
	}

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_chef_automate/v1/properties</operation_uri><produces>application/json</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>false</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dmurray</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-24 12:10:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>3b483212dbd12300197478fdaa961961</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>update</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Chef Automate" source="x_chef_automate">4cd4b300db68e700197478fdaa961908</sys_package><sys_policy>protected</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Chef Automate">4cd4b300db68e700197478fdaa961908</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_3b483212dbd12300197478fdaa961961</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mscott</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-04 10:45:30</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Chef Automate Properties">4ec4b69edb912300197478fdaa96198d</web_service_definition><web_service_version display_value="v1">7465f69edb912300197478fdaa9619d3</web_service_version></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
